CustomField.description: Required in combination with the Opp Score to temporarily remove hot opportunities from to-do lists in case there is a fixed date, until contact is unnecessary/unwanted // Stakeholder: Sales
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is there a date before which we should NOT contact the prospect? Set by sales agent in order to exclude the opp from to-do lists until the selected date.
CustomField.label: Do Not Flag Until
